title: John Goodman Shows Off Dramatic Weight Loss at London's "Trumbo" Premiere
text:
John Goodman Shows Off Dramatic Weight Loss at London's "Trumbo" Premiere Posted just a moment ago 
Lloyd Bishop/NBC (LONDON) -- John Goodman showed off some dramatic weight loss Thursday night at the London premiere of his new movie Trumbo . 
The 63-year-old actor has spoken in the past about his struggles with weight, saying he once topped 400 pounds. His rep told ABC News Goodman's weight loss is due to basic exercise and diet, which the actor's focusing on now. 
This isn't the first time Goodman has slimmed down: in 2010, he lost more than 100 pounds. "I wanted to live life better," he told People magazine at the time, adding that he quit drinking and worked out six days a week. He also told David Letterman during that time that he knows his weight will be an ongoing battle and that "I'm not gonna look like Paris Hilton or anything." 
Trumbo , starring Bryan Cranston as Hollywood screenwriter Dalton Trumbo, is out Nov. 6.
